BYUs Casey Clinger, a junior from American Fork, finished third in the 10,000-meter run on Day 1 of the NCAA Outdoor Track and Field Championships in Austin, Texas, on Wednesday.

articles.title: 24 Hours of Le Mans 2023: Everything You Need to Know with Anthony Davidson - Autosport
articles.description: It's the 100th anniversary of the 24 Hours of Le Mans! So we've chatted to 2014 WEC Champion Anthony Davidson, as well as Autosport's Sportscar Reporter Gary...
